feed.title: NocoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.258.11: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
üöÄ NocoDB : Bug Fix Release

‚ö†Ô∏è Deprecation of audit logs v1

When we initially introduced audit logs (v1), they were a foundational feature but remained incomplete and remained underdeveloped over time.

Here‚Äôs how: - Limited Coverage: The existing audit logs captured less than 25% of the actions within the product. Key operations‚Äîsuch as creating or modifying fields, filters, sorts, views, row comments, collaborators and webhooks etc‚Äîwere not tracked at all. Over 150+ releases, the logs failed to keep up with NocoDB‚Äôs expanding feature set. - Incomplete Information: Even for the events that were logged, the data was partial and insufficient. For example record audit details often appeared fragmented, leaving gaps that fell short of enterprise-grade requirements.

As part of our commitment to providing the best possible experience with NocoDB we decided to deprecate audit logs v1. So audit logs v1 no longer be part of the open-source (OSS) variant and Enterprise Audit Logs (v2) will be introduced & exclusively available to self-hosted enterprise users and cloud users.

Audit Logs v2 built from the ground up to address these gaps to offer:

  • Comprehensive coverage of all critical actions within NocoDB.
  • Detailed and reliable logs suited to enterprise use cases.

We will always be transparent and proactive in every change, if you are looking for comprehensive audit logs (v2) - it will be soon available in our self-hosted and cloud enterprise solution.

üêõ Closed Issues

  • [closed] üêõ Bug: chrismas toggle button won't show for users who don't have any acess #10137
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Error in Grid when pageInfo is undefined in list api #10132
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Attachments - This request has been blocked; the content must be served over HTTPS. #10122
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Account delete "User doesn't exist" #10116
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Patch API for fields with select options #10109
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Unreferenced nocodb release 0.258.7 #10092
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Rows Inserted via REST API Not Visible in Kanban View #10057
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: One-to-many relation "Linking failed" when updating field since 0.258.7 #10056
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Unable to upgrade SQLite database from prior version #10052
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug:NC_EXPORT_MAX_TIMEOUT issue: Export fails for higher values and splits into multiple files #10024
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Attachment Display & Download Issue on SSL Fresh Installation #9786
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Nested Create Record Modal - Hide Fields, change display value field #9498
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: linked records - click opens linked record not removes it #7099
  • [üìû Status: Need Internal Discussion] üî¶ Feature: Add new rows and make cell editble in Locked View mode #5439
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature] üî¶ Feature: [Row Expansion] Copy Paste from excel to table + add more records as required #3567

What's Changed

  • Release 0.258.10 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10099
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10100
  • chore: bump to node 22 wip by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10065
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10069
  • Docs/webhook overview by @AMEESHAARACKAL in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10085
  • fix(nc-gui): update sort toolbar menu dropdown UI same as groupby by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10103
  • fix: One-to-many relation "Linking failed" by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10107
  • fix: order migration recovery by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10102
  • fix: cannot delete id column by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10105

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.0 : Record reorder & Insert anywhere
entry.content:
üöÄ NocoDB : Feature Release

We‚Äôre excited to introduce Record Re-order & Insert Anywhere in NocoDB!

Drag-and-Drop to Reorder Records: Easily organize your records by dragging and dropping them within the grid. Whether you're prioritizing tasks, arranging items, or customizing views, you now have the freedom to structure your data just the way you need.

Insert New Record Anywhere: Adding new records is more intuitive than ever. Use the Insert Above and Insert Below options in the record context menu to place new entries exactly where they belong, saving time and reducing manual adjustments.

These powerful enhancements give you full control over your data, allowing for smoother workflows, better organization, and improved usability when working with large datasets.

üêõ Closed Issues

  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Update website footer year to 2025 #10177
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Auto Upstall fails Docker installation on Amazon Linux #10160
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Unable to Directly Add a Record to an External Database #9490
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature] üî¶ Feature: Multi field editor - show system fields #9264
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Year formula for date fields #8721
  • [closed] [Enhancement] add the function of "number format options" under the rollup column #5312
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature] üî¶ Feature: Drag and Drop Rows #4748
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature] üî¶ Feature: Share View - Custom URL/Custom UUID #3963

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.1: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.0...0.260.1

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
üêõ Closed Issues

  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Not sure if this is a bug or missing feature but in the New UI there is no global Audit #10238
  • [closed] Edit Access after selecting Share #10205
  • [üîé Status: More Info Needed] üêõ Bug: Cannot login after a fresh start #10125
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: database audit missing #10101
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: adding a new mysql data source requires db user with create database permission #9990

  • [üî¶ Type: Feature] üî¶ Feature: Modification History Tracking #9549
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Investigate bulk update #9117
  • [Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: Bulk update is not shown in the audit log. #8964
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Updates Committed to Data Source while being keyed in but before being committed to NocoDB #5895
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature] üî¶ Feature: Improve audit logs to properly show REST API calls #2030

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.4: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
üêõ Closed Issues

  • [closed] üêõ Bug: DATESTR function is not available for your database #10377
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Data deletion bug when filtering and selecting all records #10375
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Trying to edit any field in kanban view causes cursor to move into date field. #10374
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: NocoDB not starting after update to latest version #10355
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: lookup field are limited to 25 ! #10354
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: hash mismatch in Nix build #10339
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: MySQL as ExtSource- Allow using text instead of set when using select fields #10338
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Deserialization Error on Minio plugin - fresh upstall #10332
  • [closed] Free Vulnerability Code Review for Your GitHub Repository #10327
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Installation script fails to retrieve external IP address due to HTML response from ifconfig.co #10320
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Rename table #10313
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Option to Enable Paginated View #10292
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'findIndex') - error updating a linked field in the kanban view #10283
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Webhook is sent out of date. #10281
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Disorder in hidden fields on kanban cards. #10276
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Meta sync not working for postgres db integration #10255
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Link field API response issue #10222
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Can't use "field summary" in a "group by" view #10221
  • [closed] cannot create source via api #10178
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Roll-up sum of formula #10144
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Cannot use OVH S3 Plugin: "Invalid Region: region was not a valid dns name" #9942
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Question mark isn't automatically escaped in REGEX_EXTRACT #9847
  • [üêõ Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: Formula to linked formula which is primary #9812
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Delete Webhook Payload only visible Columns #9778
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Webhook doesnt fire when a relation gets updated #9763
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'date_format') while update external PG table #9731
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature] üî¶ Feature: Support the import of CSV files with non-UTF-8 encodings. #9634
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: difference between time field is in JSON format #9511
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: "T is not iterable" when trying to delete records #9307
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature] üî¶ Feature: Introduce Bulk Delete button for attachment fields #9282
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature] üî¶ Feature: record audit logs as date and time instead of "days and hours ago" #9106
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature] üî¶ Feature: Inquiry about the completeness and openness of the nc-help library #9012
  • [Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: Many-to-many relationships are not deleted when deleting a record #8366
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Adding rows in middle of the table #8196
  • [üîé Status: More Info Needed] üêõ Bug: copy record url in detail view not working #7117
  • [üëã For : Community or Good First Issue] Doesn't create relations from Postgresql DB #719

What's Changed

  • Release 0.260.2 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10274
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10275
  • feat: data reflection preps by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10227
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10278
  • Refactor: Do not pass expanded form store as prop by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10279
  • fix: Metadata sync - typo correction by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10280
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10284
